action.action-desc: Mr. Poliquin (for himself and Mrs. Kirkpatrick) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To make permanent the pilot program administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs regarding enhanced contract care authority for the health care needs of veterans located in highly rural areas, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Helping our Rural Veterans Receive Health Care Act.

section.header: Program of enhanced contract care authority for health care needs of veterans in highly rural areas

subsection.text: Subsection (a) of section 403 of the Veterans’ Mental Health and Other Care Improvements Act of 2008 (Public Law 110–387; 38 U.S.C. 1703 note) is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating paragraph (4) as paragraph (3); and

subparagraph.text: by striking Veterans Integrated Service Networks (and such other locations as the Secretary considers appropriate) and inserting locations; and
by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:
Such other locations that the Secretary determines necessary to ensure that all covered veterans may participate in the program.

paragraph.text: by striking pilot program each place it appears and inserting program; and
in subsection (k)(2), by striking regarding and all that follows through the period and inserting regarding the continuation of the program..
